00017 /**
00018  *      try to turn a mixture of html code an plain text into valid html
00019  *
00020  *      @param string $html input
00021  *      @return string encoded output
00022  */
00023 function html_encode_str_smart($html)
00024 {
00025         // TODO (later): remove debug code
00026         log_msg('debug', 'html_encode_str_smart: string is '.quot(var_dump_inl($html)));
00027         
00028         // encode ampersand characters where needed
00029         $cur = 0;
00030         while ($cur < strlen($html)) {
00031                 // check &
00032                 if (substr($html, $cur, 1) == '&') {
00033                         $replace = true;
00034                         // DEBUG
00035                         $reason = false;
00036                         
00037                         // check &#??
00038                         if ($cur+3 < strlen($html) && substr($html, $cur+1, 1) == '#') {
00039                                 // check $#x or not
00040                                 if (strtolower(substr($html, $cur+2, 1)) == 'x') {
00041                                         // check for hexadecimal characters before ;
00042                                         $ahead = $cur+3;
00043                                         while ($ahead < strlen($html)) {
00044                                                 $char = strtolower(substr($html, $ahead, 1));
00045                                                 if ((48 <= ord($char) && ord($char) <= 57) || (97 <= ord($char) && ord($char) <= 102)) {
00046                                                         // valid hexadecimal character
00047                                                         $ahead++;
00048                                                 } elseif ($char == ';') {
00049                                                         if ($cur+3 < $ahead) {
00050                                                                 // valid entitiy
00051                                                                 $replace = false;
00052                                                                 break;
00053                                                         } else {
00054                                                                 // invalid entity
00055                                                                 // DEBUG
00056                                                                 $reason = 1;
00057                                                                 break;
00058                                                         }
00059                                                 } else {
00060                                                         // invalid entity
00061                                                         // DEBUG
00062                                                         $reason = 2;
00063                                                         break;
00064                                                 }
00065                                         }
00066                                         if ($ahead == strlen($html)) {
00067                                                 // DEBUG
00068                                                 $reason = 3;
00069                                         }
00070                                 } elseif (is_numeric(substr($html, $cur+2, 1))) {
00071                                         // check for for decimal characters before ;
00072                                         $ahead = $cur+3;
00073                                         while ($ahead < strlen($html)) {
00074                                                 $char = substr($html, $ahead, 1);
00075                                                 if (48 <= ord($char) && ord($char) <= 57) {
00076                                                         // valid decimal character
00077                                                         $ahead++;
00078                                                 } elseif ($char == ';') {
00079                                                         // valid entity
00080                                                         $replace = false;
00081                                                         break;
00082                                                 } else {
00083                                                         // invalid entity
00084                                                         $reason = 4;
00085                                                         break;
00086                                                 }
00087                                         }
00088                                         if ($ahead == strlen($html)) {
00089                                                 // DEBUG
00090                                                 $reason = 5;
00091                                         }
00092                                 } else {
00093                                         // DEBUG
00094                                         $reason = 6;
00095                                 }
00096                         } else {
00097                                 // assume a named entity
00098                                 // it turns out we can't use get_html_translation_table() 
00099                                 // for this as the HTML_ENTITIES table is not complete
00100                                 $ahead = $cur+1;
00101                                 while ($ahead < strlen($html)) {
00102                                         $char = strtolower(substr($html, $ahead, 1));
00103                                         if ((48 <= ord($char) && ord($char) <= 57) || (97 <= ord($char) && ord($char) <= 122)) {
00104                                                 // valid alphanumeric character
00105                                                 $ahead++;
00106                                         } elseif ($char == ';') {
00107                                                 if ($cur+1 < $ahead) {
00108                                                         // (supposedly) valid entity
00109                                                         $replace = false;
00110                                                         break;
00111                                                 } else {
00112                                                         // invalid entity
00113                                                         // DEBUG
00114                                                         $reason = 7;
00115                                                         break;
00116                                                 }
00117                                         } else {
00118                                                 // invalid entity
00119                                                 // DEBUG
00120                                                 $reason = 8;
00121                                                 break;
00122                                         }
00123                                 }
00124                                 if ($ahead == strlen($html)) {
00125                                         $reason = 9;
00126                                         break;
00127                                 }
00128                         }
00129                         
00130                         if ($replace) {
00131                                 log_msg('debug', 'html_encode_str_smart: replacing ampersand at '.$cur.' because of '.$reason);
00132                                 $html = substr($html, 0, $cur).'&amp;'.substr($html, $cur+1);
00133                                 log_msg('debug', 'html_encode_str_smart: new string is '.quot(var_dump_inl($html)));
00134                                 $cur += 5;
00135                         } else {
00136                                 log_msg('debug', 'html_encode_str_smart: not replacing ampersand at '.$cur);
00137                                 $cur++;
00138                         }
00139                 } else {
00140                         $cur++;
00141                 }
00142         }
00143         
00144         // encode < and > where needed
00145         $cur = 0;
00146         while ($cur < strlen($html)) {
00147                 $char = substr($html, $cur, 1);
00148                 $replace = true;
00149                 
00150                 if ($char == '<') {
00151                         // a possible tag
00152                         // search for a closing bracket
00153                         $ahead = $cur+1;
00154                         while ($ahead < strlen($html)) {
00155                                 $c = strtolower(substr($html, $ahead, 1));
00156                                 if ($c == '<') {
00157                                         // found another opening bracket
00158                                         // the first one can't be legit
00159                                         // DEBUG
00160                                         $reason = 1;
00161                                         break;
00162                                 } elseif ($c == '>') {
00163                                         if ($cur+1 < $ahead) {
00164                                                 // can be a valid tag
00165                                                 $replace = false;
00166                                                 // forward till after the closing bracket
00167                                                 $cur = $ahead;
00168                                                 break;
00169                                         } else {
00170                                                 // invalid (empty) tag
00171                                                 // DEBUG
00172                                                 $reason = 2;
00173                                                 break;
00174                                         }
00175                                 } elseif ($ahead == $cur+1) {
00176                                         if ((48 <= ord($c) && ord($c) <= 57) || (97 <= ord($c) && ord($c) <= 122) || $c == '/') {
00177                                                 // starts with an alphanumeric character or a slash, can be valid
00178                                         } else {
00179                                                 // DEBUG
00180                                                 $reason = 3;
00181                                                 break;
00182                                         }
00183                                 }
00184                                 $ahead++;
00185                         }
00186                         if ($ahead == strlen($html)) {
00187                                 // DEBUG
00188                                 $reason = 4;
00189                         }
00190                 } else if ($char == '>') {
00191                         // we should be getting all valid tags through the code above
00192                         // DEBUG
00193                         $reason = 5;
00194                 }
00195                 
00196                 if ($replace && $char == '<') {
00197                         log_msg('debug', 'html_encode_str_smart: replacing opening bracket at '.$cur.' because of '.$reason);
00198                         $html = substr($html, 0, $cur).'&lt;'.substr($html, $cur+1);
00199                         log_msg('debug', 'html_encode_str_smart: new string is '.quot(var_dump_inl($html)));
00200                         $cur += 4;
00201                 } elseif ($replace && $char == '>') {
00202                         log_msg('debug', 'html_encode_str_smart: replacing closing bracket at '.$cur.' because of '.$reason);
00203                         $html = substr($html, 0, $cur).'&gt;'.substr($html, $cur+1);
00204                         log_msg('debug', 'html_encode_str_smart: new string is '.quot(var_dump_inl($html)));
00205                         $cur += 4;
00206                 } else {
00207                         $cur++;
00208                 }
00209         }
00210         
00211         return $html;
00212 }

00215 /**
00216  *      parse a string containing html elements
00217  *
00218  *      this function decodes html's special characters except for the content 
00219  *      (when it too is not being parsed).
00220   *     this function is more fragile than html_parse_elem() when it comes to 
00221  *      malformatted input.
00222  *      @param string $html input string
00223  *      @param bool $recursive also parse children elements
00224  *      @return array parsed representation
00225  */
00226 function html_parse($html, $recursive = false)
00227 {
00228         global $single_tags;            // from html.inc.php
00229         
00230         $ret = array();
00231         
00232         $pos = 0;
00233         $open_tag = false;
00234         $open_pos = false;
00235         // can probably be done with -1 and some slightly easier code below
00236         $close_pos = false;
00237         $num_open = 0;
00238         
00239         while ($pos < strlen($html)) {
00240                 if ($html[$pos] == '<') {
00241                         if (($next = strpos($html, '>', $pos+1)) === false) {
00242                                 // error: unclosed <
00243                                 $pos++;
00244                                 continue;
00245                         }
00246                         // handle uppercase tags as well
00247                         $tag = strtolower(trim(substr($html, $pos+1, $next-$pos-1)));
00248                         
00249                         if (substr($tag, 0, 1) !== '/') {
00250                                 // opening tag
00251                                 if ($num_open == 0) {
00252                                         $a = expl_whitesp($tag, true);
00253                                         $open_tag = $a[0];
00254                                         $open_pos = $pos;
00255                                 }
00256                                 // handle single tags
00257                                 if (in_array($tag, $single_tags)) {
00258                                         if ($num_open == 0) {
00259                                                 // check if there was something between the last $close_pos and $open_pos
00260                                                 $text = '';
00261                                                 if ($close_pos === false && 0 < $open_pos) {
00262                                                         $text = trim(substr($html, 0, $open_pos));
00263                                                 } elseif ($close_pos !== false && $close_pos+1 < $open_pos) {
00264                                                         $text = trim(substr($html, $close_pos+1, $open_pos-$close_pos-1));
00265                                                 }
00266                                                 if (0 < strlen($text)) {
00267                                                         $ret[] = $text;
00268                                                 }                                               
00269                                                 $close_pos = $next;
00270                                                 $ret[] = html_parse_elem(substr($html, $open_pos, $close_pos-$open_pos+1), $recursive);
00271                                         }
00272                                 } else {
00273                                         $num_open++;
00274                                 }
00275                         } else {
00276                                 // closing tag
00277                                 $num_open--;
00278                                 if ($num_open == 0) {
00279                                         // check if opening and closing tag match
00280                                         if ($open_tag != substr($tag, 1)) {
00281                                                 // error: opening and closing tag do not match
00282                                                 $pos++;
00283                                                 continue;
00284                                         }
00285                                         // check if there was something between the last $close_pos and $open_pos
00286                                         $text = '';
00287                                         if ($close_pos === false && 0 < $open_pos) {
00288                                                 $text = trim(substr($html, 0, $open_pos));
00289                                         } elseif ($close_pos !== false && $close_pos+1 < $open_pos) {
00290                                                 $text = trim(substr($html, $close_pos+1, $open_pos-$close_pos-1));
00291                                         }
00292                                         if (0 < strlen($text)) {
00293                                                 $ret[] = $text;
00294                                         }
00295                                         $close_pos = $next;
00296                                         $ret[] = html_parse_elem(substr($html, $open_pos, $close_pos-$open_pos+1), $recursive);
00297                                 }
00298                         }
00299                 }
00300                 $pos++;
00301         }
00302         // check if there was something after the last $close_pos
00303         $text = '';
00304         if ($close_pos === false && 1 < $pos) {
00305                 $text = trim($html);
00306         } elseif ($close_pos !== false && $close_pos+1 < $pos) {
00307                 $text = trim(substr($html, $close_pos+1));
00308         }
00309         if (0 < strlen($text)) {
00310                 $ret[] = $text;
00311         }
00312         
00313         return $ret;
00314 }

00317 /**
00318  *      parse exactly one html element
00319  *
00320  *      this function decodes html's special characters except for the content 
00321  *      (when it too is not being parsed).
00322  *      this function is less fragile than html_parse() when it comes to 
00323  *      malformatted input.
00324  *      @param string $html input string (must start and end with the element's tag)
00325  *      @param bool $recursive also parse children elements
00326  *      @return array parsed representation
00327  */
00328 function html_parse_elem($html, $recursive = false)
00329 {
00330         global $single_tags;            // from html.inc.php
00331         $quot = array('"', "'");
00332         
00333         $ret = array();
00334         
00335         // explode the tag
00336         $next = strpos($html, '>', 1);
00337         $a = expl_whitesp(substr($html, 1, $next-1), true);
00338         if (count($a) < 1) {
00339                 return $ret;
00340         } else {
00341                 $ret['tag'] = strtolower($a[0]);
00342         }
00343         
00344         // attributes can end up in one to three fields
00345         // combine them
00346         for ($i=1; $i < count($a); $i++) {
00347                 if ($a[$i] == '=' && 1 < $i && $i+1 < count($a)) {
00348                         $a[$i] = $a[$i-1].'='.$a[$i+1];
00349                         array_splice($a, $i-1, 1);
00350                         array_splice($a, $i, 1);
00351                         $i--;
00352                 } elseif (substr($a[$i], -1) == '=' && $i+1 < count($a)) {
00353                         $a[$i] .= $a[$i+1];
00354                         array_splice($a, $i+1, 1);
00355                         $i--;
00356                 } elseif (substr($a[$i], 0, 1) == '=' && 1 < $i) {
00357                         $a[$i] = $a[$i-1].$a[$i];
00358                         array_splice($a, $i-1, 1);
00359                         $i--;
00360                 }
00361         }
00362         
00363         // put attributes into array
00364         for ($i=1; $i < count($a); $i++) {
00365                 if (($equal = strpos($a[$i], '=')) === false) {
00366                         $attr = strtolower(htmlspecialchars_decode($a[$i], ENT_QUOTES));
00367                         $ret[$attr] = $attr;
00368                 } else {
00369                         $attr = strtolower(htmlspecialchars_decode(substr($a[$i], 0, $equal), ENT_QUOTES));
00370                         $val = htmlspecialchars_decode(substr($a[$i], $equal+1), ENT_QUOTES);
00371                         // strip optional quotes
00372                         if (in_array(substr($val, 0, 1), $quot) && substr($val, 0, 1) == substr($val, -1)) {
00373                                 $val = substr($val, 1, -1);
00374                         }
00375                         // special cases for certain attributes
00376                         if ($attr == 'class') {
00377                                 $val = expl(' ', $val);
00378                         } elseif ($attr == 'style') {
00379                                 $styles = expl(';', $val);
00380                                 $val = array();
00381                                 foreach ($styles as $style) {
00382                                         $temp = expl(':', $style);
00383                                         if (1 < count($temp)) {
00384                                                 $val[strtolower(trim($temp[0]))] = trim(implode(':', array_slice($temp, 1)));
00385                                         }
00386                                 }
00387                         }
00388                         $ret[$attr] = $val;
00389                 }
00390         }
00391         
00392         // handle content
00393         if (!in_array($ret['tag'], $single_tags)) {
00394                 // check if there is actually a closing tag
00395                 if (($last = strrpos($html, '<')) !== false) {
00396                         // check if opening and closing tags match
00397                         if (strtolower(substr($html, $last+2, -1)) == $ret['tag']) {
00398                                 $ret['val'] = trim(substr($html, $next+1, $last-$next-1));
00399                                 if ($recursive) {
00400                                         $ret['val'] = html_parse($ret['val'], true);
00401                                 }
00402                         }
00403                 }
00404         }
00405         
00406         return $ret;
00407 }
